data.comment: A total of [59] spectators is reported.
A total of [59] spectators is reported.
The match has started.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cologne in their own half.
An attacking Cologne player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Guido Winkmann awards the home team a throw-in.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Cologne in their own half.
It's advantage Cologne in Cologne as Mark Uth scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
Guido Winkmann signals a Mainz throw-in in Cologne's half.
Throw-in for Mainz at RheinEnergieStadion.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Mainz.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Cologne territory.
Mainz push forward at RheinEnergieStadion and Jean-Paul Boetius gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cologne defence.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Guido Winkmann awards Mainz a goal kick.
Can Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Mainz.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Cologne.
Goal kick for Mainz at RheinEnergieStadion.
Free kick for Cologne in the half of Mainz.
Free kick in a good position for Mainz!
At RheinEnergieStadion, Florian Kainz has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Jonas Hector (Cologne) has received a yellow card from Guido Winkmann.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Cologne have a goal kick.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Cologne goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cologne.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Cologne.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Cologne.
Cologne's Ellyes Skhiri gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Throw-in Cologne.
Mainz drives forward and Karim Onisiwo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Guido Winkmann awards Cologne a goal kick.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Cologne in their own half.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Cologne in their own half.
Cologne needs to be cautious. Mainz have an attacking throw-in.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Cologne.
Mainz's Dong Won Ji has been booked in Cologne.
Mainz have a dangerous throw-in.
Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Mainz.
Throw-in for Mainz at RheinEnergieStadion.
Cologne's Jhon Cordoba looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jhon Cordoba.
Cologne have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cologne's Florian Kainz breaks free at RheinEnergieStadion. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Cologne in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Cologne.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mark Uth (Cologne) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Cologne.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cologne.
The first-half has ended.
Guido Winkmann has blown to start the second-half.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Cologne make their first substitution with Dominick Drexler replacing Jan Thielmann.
Mainz are whistled for offside.
Throw-in Cologne.
Can Mainz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cologne's half?
Guido Winkmann awards the home team a throw-in.
Jhon Cordoba for Cologne gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Mainz at RheinEnergieStadion.
Mainz have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Cologne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Cologne.
Goal! Florian Kainz extends Cologne lead to 2-0 with a header.
Great play from Dominick Drexler to set up the goal.
Free kick Mainz.
Free kick for Mainz in the half of Cologne.
Mainz push upfield but Guido Winkmann quickly pulls them for offside.
Taiwo Awoniyi is replacing Dong Won Ji for the away team.
Cologne pushes forward through Ellyes Skhiri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Cologne.
Jonas Hector (Cologne) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Cologne in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Mainz reduce the deficit to 2-1 through Taiwo Awoniyi.
That's a fine assist from Ridle Baku.
Ball safe as Cologne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Mainz defence as Mark Uth fires in a strike for Cologne.
Cologne have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Mainz have a goal kick.
Throw-in Mainz.
Throw-in for Mainz in their own half.
At RheinEnergieStadion, Cologne are penalized for being offside.
Guido Winkmann awards Cologne a goal kick.
Guido Winkmann signals a Mainz throw-in in Cologne's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cologne.
Achim Beierlorzer is making the team's second substitution at RheinEnergieStadion with Adam Szalai replacing Edimilson Fernandes.
In Cologne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Cologne in their own half.
Mainz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Guido Winkmann awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Florian Kainz with Kingsley Schindler. This is the second substitution made today by Markus Gisdol.
Goal! Pierre Kunde levels the match at 2-2.
Mainz to take a throw-in in Cologne territory.
Guido Winkmann signals a throw-in for Mainz, close to Cologne's area.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Mainz in their own half.
Elvis Rexhbecaj is replacing Jonas Hector for Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Throw-in for Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Can Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Goal kick for Mainz at RheinEnergieStadion.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Mainz.
Mainz are coming forward and Jean-Paul Boetius gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Guido Winkmann awards Cologne a goal kick.
Jhon Cordoba gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cologne.
Guido Winkmann signals a Mainz throw-in in Cologne's half.
Guido Winkmann waits before resuming play because [36] for [37] is still down.
[36] returns to the field for [37] after picking up a slight injury.
Markus Gisdol (Cologne) is making a fourth substitution, with Kingsley Ehizibue replacing Benno Erik Schmitz.
The home team replace Jhon Cordoba with Simon Terodde.
Danny Latza is on a sub for Pierre Kunde for Mainz.
Leandro Martins is replacing Jean-Paul Boetius for Mainz at RheinEnergieStadion.
Mainz make their fifth substitution with Jonathan Michael Burkardt replacing Karim Onisiwo.
Cologne have been awarded a corner by Guido Winkmann.
Free kick Cologne.
In Cologne, Toni Leistner (Cologne) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Mainz goal kick.
Goal kick for Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Guido Winkmann signals a free kick to Mainz in their own half.
Elvis Rexhbecaj is booked for the home team.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Mainz.
Mainz's Robin Quaison gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cologne defender.
Mainz awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Cologne have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cologne at RheinEnergieStadion.
Can Cologne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mainz's half?
Free kick for Cologne in the half of Mainz.
Ball safe as Mainz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Cologne.
Throw-in for Mainz in the half of Cologne.
That's full-time at RheinEnergieStadion. The final score is 2-2.
Ellyes Skhiri for Cologne has been booked by Guido Winkmann and receives a first yellow card.
Aaron Martin (Mainz) gets a yellow card.
